Plot: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.
Title: Gallipoli
Actors: Mark Lee, Bill Kerr, Harold Hopkins, Charles Lathalu Yunipingu
tomatoConsensus: Peter Weir's devastating anti-war film features a low-key but emotionally wrenching performance from Mel Gibson as a young soldier fighting in one of World War I's most deadly and horrifying battles.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 11 wins & 5 nominations.
